name: One Brave Chicken
description:
One Brave Chicken was created for the A Game By It's Cover 2016 game jam. This game is based on the "House On The Left" Famicart by Andrew Gallardo and Jonathan Bilski. A powerful necromancer has turned you into a chicken and taken all of your friends hostage in a house filled with his minions. Will you be brave enough to face zombie hordes, vicious bats, spooky ghosts, and defeat the necromancer?

Special thanks to the DSR squad,  and everyone that supports my games.  🐺
